name: BN-HUB
0:
”Alexa, turn on plug”
”Alexa, turn off plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Through BN-HUB smart APP, Help you to easily connect smart devices and realize the interconnection of smart devices.
Supports voice-controlled smart devices such as Alexa for easy control, such as:
You can control the switchsin your home by voice, such as:“Alexa turn on bedroom switch”，“Alexa, turn on switch”.
